H0.text: when was the first commercial cell phone released. 1979

H1.text: when was the first commercial cell phone released. 1981

H2.text: when was the first commercial cell phone released. 1985

H3.text: when was the first commercial cell phone released. 1983

A4.text: Unveiled on March 6, 1983, the DynaTAC was the first commercially available handheld cellular phone.

A5.text: Quantity production of the DynaTAC 8000X commenced early in April 1984, at which point it was fully commercially available.
